title.narrative: Solar Bonus program development and pilot implementation plan

description.narrative: 1. Mexico City Ministry of Environment (SEDEMA, by its acronym in Spanish) 2. The Trust for Thermal Insulation (FIPATERM, by its acronym in Spanish)

1. Solar Bonus ready-to- implement program document 2. Solar Bonus pilot project implementation structure and plan 3. Coordination and communication platform for key-stakeholders alignment and integration 4. Training Zapopan municipality

The project will allow to develop a Solar Bonus pilot project plan and an integrated Program for scaled deployment to the government in order to facilitate implementation. The Solar Bonus Program will allow the re-direction of Mexico’s mainly fossil based residential electricity subsidy resources, towards an incentive to catalyze investments for massive adoption of photovoltaic distributed generation (solar rooftops) in Mexican homes.
